title: How to Make a Child's Smock from an Old Business Shirt

steps.headline: Remove the collar and cuffs from the shirt.
Fold over the material at both the cuffs and collar areas and hem using running stitch.
Thread elastic through the hemmed areas.
steps.description: Measure the right fit for the elastic.

steps.headline: Give to your child for art class.
steps.description: Tell your child to wear it with the buttons on the back.

text: Remove the collar and cuffs from the shirt.  Fold over the material at both the cuffs and collar areas and hem using running stitch.  Thread elastic through the hemmed areas. Measure the right fit for the elastic. Give to your child for art class. Tell your child to wear it with the buttons on the back.
